QuestData.Title: Trolling Them
QuestData.Description: My army is disciplined, and they will follow my order not to engage the kaldorei in combat unless I give the command.$b$bHowever, it is with some level of shame that I must admit both armies have been attempting to harass the other with pranks, littering our respective camps with insults.$b$bPlease, $p, we need someone both armies respect to collect these items before fighting breaks out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Remove insulting items from the elven war camps.
